comment: I have noticed some folks following me that seem to have hatred for certain races of people. I am NOT a white supremist. I am a god and country lover. If President Trump was a black, Hispanic, etc man I would love him just the same. Its what he stands for that I love. What I will NOT tolerate is Islam. I want it wiped from the face of the earth.
